text: my name is leslie wilson i'm a customer
solutions manager and i'm based out of
charlotte north carolina
my customers are public sector
organizations migrating to the cloud
[Music]
[Applause]
to be successful at customer solutions
is
really getting a good understanding of
what your customer values are their
business drivers and listening to what
they are not saying so that you can
anticipate
hurdles along the way
when i first arrived here i was very
anxious and nervous about whether or not
i made the right decision and making the
transition
to amazon web services
after going through the training program
i quickly understood why
i was at the right place and why i was
offered the position because of my
skills and my background in program
management
relationship building
and being a strategic leader
the affinity groups that i am a member
of are the blacks employee network
as well as women at amazon and also
people with disabilities
the benefit of joining affinity groups
is helping to connect and build
community with people with similar
backgrounds as well as being a mentor
and coach for people in these
communities to assist them along their
career and journey
it's a really exciting place the culture
is one that's very fast-paced but it's
very energetic and
we are all empowered
to make decisions
that's a pretty cool place to work
